snippet.title: How Do You Redesign Civilisation? | Jordan Hall | Modern Wisdom Podcast #055
snippet.description:
Jordan Hall is the Co Founder of Neurohacker Collective, the Co Founder of DivX and a writer.

What is the game that our civilisation has been playing for the last era? And where has that brought us to? Today we take a birds' eye view of society and civilisation as a whole as we work out whether we can play a better game than this.

Extra Stuff:
